concept.definition: the individual identifies with neither/both female and male
the individual does not wish to disclose his gender identity

description: This example code system defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate a individual's gender identity.
name: GenderIdentity

text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/gender-identity defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
non-binary Non-binarythe individual identifies with neither/both female and male
male Malethe individual identifies as male
female Femalethe individual identifies as female
other Otherother gender identity
non-disclose Does not wish to disclosethe individual does not wish to disclose his gender identity
